html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-11132024-10-18PCH
ActBroadcasting Act
PrecisAppointment of MARIE-PHILIPPE BOUCHARD of Montreal, Quebec, to be President of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, in the place of Catherine Tait, whose term will expire, effective January 3, 2025.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Appointment of MARIE-PHILIPPE BOUCHARD of Montreal, Quebec, to be President of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, in the place of Catherine Tait, whose term will expire, effective January 3, 2025.
